content: ** this pattern is also available for free on my blog with ads ** the fancy puff trivet was written as a companion design to the fancy puff coasters - featuring the puff design and slip_stitch border that made the fancy puff coasters what they were but with a new fun shape using between 75-85 yards of yarn these trivets don t take long to finish and are perfect for your holiday table they come out at around 8 by 7 25 when laid flat they also look fantastic with a little faux leather strap to hang or laid flat on your countertop for each trivet you will need the following * us h/5 00 hook * 75-85 yds of cotton worsted weight yarn * scissors * tapestry needle * 5 stitch markers optional notes regarding gauge * i did not focus too much on gauge for this pattern but if you are looking at following my gauge work 4 rounds and take a measurement - this fourth row should be around 4 across happy crocheting
